rata pura pawathina hotal ha aapanashalawala aahara sakas kirimata saha paribhogikayanta panaya kirimata labadena jalaye yogyathawa pariksha kirima sandaha wu wyapruthiyata adalawa jala sampal 4000ka pamana pramanayak me wana wita saukhya amathyanshayata labi thibe.mahajana saukhya parikshakawarunge saha pradeshiya waidya niladhari karyala margayen me jala sampal labi athi athara ema jala sampal parikshawa sandaha waidya rasayanagarawalata yawimata amathyanshaya katayuthu karayi.dina thunak pamana keti kalayakadi mese jala sampal wishala pramanayak labima suwisheshi we.boho aapanashala ha hotalwala aahara sakasimata yodaganna saha panaya kirimata labadena jalaya saukhyarakshitha nowana bawata idiripathwa thibena paminili salakillata gena amathyanshaye mahajana saukhya anshaya mangin me jala parikshana wyapruthiya dipa wyapthawa kriyathmaka kirimata amathyanshaya katayuthu yoda thibe.me jala sampal parikshana wyapruthiya wadath widhimathwa ha karyakshamawa sidu kirima sandaha wu chakralekhaya idiri kalaye di nikuth kirima sidu kere.nirogi sampanna janathawak bihi kara rate sanwardhana karyanta owun sahabhagi karawa ganima me wyapruthiwala aramuna bawa saukhya amathyanshaya pawasayi..

gampaha rijant pihinum thatanganaye pawathi me tharagawaliyata gampaha disthrikkaye pasal 36kin kridaka kridikawan 600k sahabhagi wuha.me tharagawaliyedi suratha dinu kridaka kridikawan meseya.10n pahala balaka - rasidu jayathilaka (sapugaskanda yoshida shokanji jathyanthara pasala) balika - chihiro pranandu (migamuwa getwe) 12n pahala balaka - tharaka nadun sirimanna (gampaha sunethra prathamika widyalaya) balika - hiruni perera (migamuwa harishchandra jathika pasala) 14n pahala balaka - pasidu dilshan sirimanna (gampaha bandaranayaka widyalaya) balika - el.
